attributes.action: Get rid of Jeremy Corbyn.We need someone who can lead. We need to stay in the EU
attributes.background: Get rid of Jeremy Corbyn.We need someone who can win&lead in the event that a general election is called before article 50 is enacted.The Tories should hash out an EU exit plan& then call a general election&let us vote on the Tories with their agreed plan or another party who will keep us in the EU.

rejection.details: This is a party political matter, not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
